sections.heading: Duration; general ruleExcept as otherwise expressly provided by law, the effect of recordation of an instrument creating a mortgage or pledge or evidencing a privilege ceases ten years after the date of the instrument
sections.text: Acts 2005, No. 169, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 2006; Acts 2005, 1st Ex. Sess., No. 13, ยง1, e
